com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions.impl

Interface Extractor<DocumentType extends Document>

  • Type Parameters:
    DocumentType - The type of the document you want to deal with.
    All Superinterfaces:
    TagListProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSampleFileStyledTextExtractor, AbstractSampleFileTextPaneExtractor, AbstractStyledTextExtractor, AbstractTextPaneExtractor, JavaFileStyledTextExtractor, JavaFileTextPaneExtractor, LatexFileStyledTextExtractor, LatexFileTextPaneExtractor, SampleFileStyledTextExtractor, SampleFileTextPaneExtractor, ServerSideXmlFileStyledTextExtractor, ServerSideXmlFileTextPaneExtractor

    public interface Extractor<DocumentType extends Document>
extends TagListProvider
    The Extractor must be implemented for extracting the text from the application document.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.extensions.segmentation.TagListProvider

      • Methods inherited from interface com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.extensions.segmentation.TagListProvider

        getDocumentType, provideTags

    • Method Detail

      • extract

        TypedCheckInformation<DocumentType> extract(AcrolinxFactory factory,
                                          ExtractionScope extractionScope,
                                          ClientSettings clientSettings,
                                          CheckCapabilities checkCapabilities)
        Extracts the text from the application document, by respecting the current configurations defined by these methods parameters.
        Parameters:
        factory - The factory could be used for creating the CheckInformation via AcrolinxFactory.checkInformations().
        extractionScope - The scope of the extraction defines if the whole text should be extracted or only a selection.
        clientSettings - The ClientSettings used to perform this extraction. They are containing also the extension settings which are used for the segmentation and filtering. See: ClientSettings.getExtensionSettings(), FilterExtension.fromExtensionSettings(com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.extension.ExtensionSettings) and SegmentationExtension.fromExtensionSettings(com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.extension.ExtensionSettings)
        checkCapabilities - The CheckCapabilities defining the check time capabilities. They are defining how the text should be extracted.
        Returns:
        The new TypedCheckInformation containing the extracted document.

      • getSelectionScope

        SelectionScope getSelectionScope()
        Returns:
        The scope of the current selection. It defines if nothing, the whole document or only a part of the document is selected.

      • getFileName

        FileName getFileName()
        Returns:
        The FileName of the current applications document.
